cause.description:
Do you spend every waking moment of your life thinking about a sammich? Don't you wish some bitch would make it for you? Well, Sammichs for all is a nonprofit 4351(a) organization dedicated to providing sammichs for, well, ALL!
1. Sammich are a universal right
2. Bitches must makes deez sammichs
cause.name: Sammichs for all
